issue.title: Could we adjust the height of the solar array box

content.raw:
I did a hg update higher_array. In Task2 , I could see the new choke. But the table height is not higher.
Tried removing gazebo paging cache, recompiling etc but didnt fix it. The models/space_array directory has the new files.
![solar_array.jpg](data/bitbucket.org/repo/xEbAAe/images/739185621-solar_array.jpg)
content.html: I did a hg update higher_array. In Task2 , I could see the new choke. But the table height is not higher. Tried removing gazebo paging cache, recompiling etc but didnt fix it. The models/space_array directory has the new files.
